Recommendations: 1. A distinct research office furnished with amenities necessary in the conduct of researches may be established
2. An in-house review of on-going and completed researches be conducted at the College level before the university level to monitor as well as evaluate the researches.
3. Each faculty researcher may prepare an action plan at the start of the school year to monitor the progress of the conducted researches.
4. A department research journal may be published.
5. Encourage all the faculty members in the department to get involved in research work.
6. A seminar on IPR laws may be conducted to be attended by faculty and students.
7. Strengthen linkages with local, regional and national agencies which are potential sources of funding
